notes: Pilot year - all free users. Focus on validation. 4 engineers + 1 PM. Minimal marketing (organic + partnerships). Manual moderation.
Freemium launch. 30% conversion to premium. 7 engineers + 1 PM + 1 designer. Performance marketing starts. Hybrid AI+manual moderation.
Scale phase. Maintain 30% conversion. 10 engineers + 2 PMs + 2 designers + QA. Multi-region infra. Increased marketing. Moderation team expansion.
Pilot year - all free. Stronger adoption than conservative. 5 engineers + 1 PM. Same marketing budget but better results.
Freemium launch. 30% conversion. 9 engineers + 2 PMs + 1 designer. Scaled performance marketing. AI moderation working well.
Scale + positive cash flow. 15 engineers + 3 PMs + 3 designers + QA + SRE. Global infra (CDN multi-region). Aggressive marketing. Break-even achieved Q2-Q3.
Pilot year with viral adoption. 6 engineers + 1 PM + 1 designer. Strong partnerships (schools). Referrals kicking in.
Freemium launch + viral growth. 30% conversion maintained. 12 engineers + 3 PMs + 2 designers. Aggressive marketing. Positive profit Q3-Q4.

Hyper-scale + international expansion. 35% conversion (improved with upsell). ARPU increased to $80 (enterprise). 25 engineers + 5 PMs + 5 designers + QA + SRE + Support. Global infrastructure. Strong profitability.
